price: Kronkron Hene no ne Nea Ɔde Na’koa (Muhammad) tuu kwan anadwo firi (Maka) Nyamedan kronkron no ho kͻͻ (Yerusalam) Aqsoa Nyamedan a nhyira atwa ho ahyia no ho no, sεdeε Yεbεkyerε no Yεn nsεnkyerεnee no mu bi. Nokorε sε Ɔne Otiefoͻ no a Ɔte biribiara na Ɔno ara nso na Ohunu biribiara.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَسۡرَىٰ بِعَبۡدِهِۦ لَيۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ إِلَى ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡأَقۡصَا ٱلَّذِي بَٰرَكۡنَا حَوۡلَهُۥ لِنُرِيَهُۥ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَآۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡبَصِيرُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna alladhī asrā biʿabdihi laylan mina al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi ilā al-masjidi al-aqṣā alladhī bāraknā ḥawlahu linuriyahu min āyātinā innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-baṣīru
